title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without including the file extension (as it is not requested).
7) Click Ok.
Observer that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location but without any file extension displayed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without including the file extension (as it is not requested).
7) Click Ok.
Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location but without any file extension displayed.
